jcomb.core.oa

Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcomb.core.oa.Tools

  • public class Tools
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for orthogonal arrays.
    Author:
    Noah Zuch

    • Method Detail

      • isPrime

        public static boolean isPrime(int n)
        Checks if a given number is a prime number.
        Parameters:
        n - the number to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given nubmer is prime, false otherwise

      • getPrimePowerDecomp

        public static int[] getPrimePowerDecomp(int n)
        Attempts to decompose the supplied number into a prime p and a power t so that: p^t = n.
        Parameters:
        n - The nunber to decompose.
        Returns:
        An int array of length two with the first value being p and the second one being t. returns null of the decomposition is not possible, or in other words n is not a prime power.

      • generateFiniteField

        public static FiniteField generateFiniteField(int n)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a FiniteField with n values. This method can only create a finite field o the supplied nubmer is a prime power.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of values in the field.
        Returns:
        A FiniteField with n values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the supplied number is not a prime power.
